column2: "Na afe a otsia esuon no mu no Jehoiada hyɛɛ noho dzen
column3: na ɔfaa ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo

column2: "Na wokekyiin Juda mu
column3: na wohyiahyiaa Juda nkurow no nyinara mu Levifo no
column4: na Israel egyanom efiefi mu etsitsir no

column2: "Na mboanofo no nyinara nye ɔhen no dzii ahyɛmu wɔ Nyankopɔn fie. Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: ɔhen ne ba no na obedzi hen
column5: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka no wɔ David mba ho no."

column2: "Adze a hom nyɛ nye yi: hom mu nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor a ɔba mu ahomgyeda no
column3: a wofi asɔfo na Levifo no mu no

column2: "na nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor so ntsena ɔhen no ne fie; na nkyɛmu ebiasa mu kor so ntsena fapem no no nkuropon no ano: na ɔman no nyinara ngyina EWURADZE fie abangua no do."
"Na mma mma obiara nnhɛn EWURADZE ne fie no mu
column3: gyedɛ asɔfo no na Levifo no mu hɔn a wɔsom no; hɔn na wɔnhɛn mu
column4: osiandɛ wɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn: na ɔman no nyinara dze
column5: wɔnhwɛ EWURADZE ne fie do ahwɛdze no."

column2: "Na Levifo no mbɔ ɔhen no ho aprɔw
column3: nyimpa biara mfa n'akodze nkitsa ne nsamu; na obiara a ɔbɛba ofi no mu no
column4: wɔmma wonku no: na hom ndzi ɔhen no nkyɛn aber a ɔreba fie

column2: "Nna Levifo na Juda nyinara yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɔfo Jehoiada hyɛe no nyinara: na wɔfefaa nyimpa biara ne nyimpa
column3: hɔn a wɔwɔ dɛ wɔba mu ahomgyeda no
column4: kaa hɔn a wɔwɔ dɛ wofir edzi ahomgyeda no ho; osiandɛ ɔsɔfo Jehoiada ammpon nkyekyɛmu no."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Jehoiada yiyii mpeaa na akyɛm akɛse na akyɛm nkakraba a ɔyɛ ɔhen David dze no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE fie no
column3: memaa ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no."

column2: "Na ɔdze ɔman no nyinara gyinagyinae
column3: nyimpa biara n'akodze kitsa ne nsamu
column4: ofi dan no n'enyimfa afamu kodu dan no n'abankum afamu
column5: wɔ afɔrmbukyia no na dan no ho

column2: "Nna wɔdze ɔhen ne ba no fiir edzi
column3: na wɔdze ahenkyɛw no soaa no
column4: na wɔdze dase no maa no
column5: na wɔhyɛɛ no hen: na Jehoiada na ne mba seraa no; na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na aber a Atalia tsee ɔman no a worututu mbirika na woriyi ɔhen ayɛw no ne gyigyeegye no
column3: nna ɔbaa ɔman no nkyɛn wɔ EWURADZE fie:"

column2: "na ɔhwɛe
column4: ɔhen no gyina no dum no ho
column6: na asafohemfo no mbɛn no wɔ ɔhen no nkyɛn; na asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara enyi gyee
column7: na wɔhɛɛn mbɛn; adwontofo no so goree wɔ nsanku ndzɛmba do
column8: na wɔkyerɛɛ ayɛyi adwontow no. Nna Atalia tsetseew ne ntar mu

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Jehoiada dze ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo no a wɔhwɛ dɔm no do no puei
column4: Hom mfa no mfa akyerɛpɛn no ntamu; na nyia obedzi n'ekyir no
column5: wɔmma wɔmfa afona nku no: na ɔsɔfo no see dɛ
column6: Mma wonnku no wɔ EWURADZE fie."

column2: "Nna wosuoo no mu faa mpɔnkɔ ahɛnee aponkɛse no ano dze kɔ ahemfie hɔ: na wokum no wɔ hɔ."
"Na Jehoiada dzii ahyɛmu wɔ ɔnoara
"Na ɔman no nyinara sii mu kɔr Baal fie kobubuu no gui
column3: na wobubuu n'afɔrmbukyia na n'ehonyi no esinesin
column4: na wokum Baal no sɔfoe Maatan wɔ afɔrmbukyia no enyim."

column2: "Na Jehoiada hyehyɛɛ EWURADZE ne fi do ahwɛdofo dze hyɛɛ asɔfo no nsa
column3: Levifo no a David kyekyɛɛ hɔn mu sisii EWURADZE ne fi do
column4: dɛ wɔmbɔ EWURADZE ne hyew afɔr no nsa
column5: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses mbra no mu no
column7: dɛ mbrɛ David ne nhyehyɛɛ tse no."

column2: "Na ɔdze mbobowano ahwɛfo no gyinagyinaa EWURADZE fi mbobotsen no ano
column3: amma obi a no ho egu fi wɔ adze biara mu aannhɛn mu."

column2: "Na ɔfaa ɔha ɔha do asafohemfo
column5: na asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyinara na wɔdze ɔhen no fi EWURADZE fie sianee: na wɔnam sor abobotsen no mu baa ɔhen no ne fie
column6: na wɔdze ɔhen no tsenaa ahendzi ahengua no do."

column2: "Nna asaase no do nkorɔfo nyinara enyi gyee
column3: na kurow no mu dwee: na Atalia dze
